data.content: Fixed ownership display in beats view: renamed column to 'Owner Type', changed badge text from 'Human next'/'Agent next' to 'Human'/'Agent', fixed ship column check to use nextActionOwnerKind instead of isAgentClaimable, and added rollbackActivePhase() to both backends to normalize stale active-phase beats back to queued state (respecting transition:verification lock). Commit 3978083 pushed to origin/main. All quality gates green (lint, typecheck, 1623 tests passed).
